cab.content: fThis Document is tho Property of0 tfc216His Britannic Majesty'3 Government.Tar Cabinett Kan power^Hejnorandum by the Secretary of State for Tar,It has been brought to my notice that in G*T.48?2 the fighting strength of the Army on 30th April, 1918, at Home and Abroad is stated in Appendix 7 to be 3,543,000*administrative branches of the Army and the heading would more correctly be shown as total strength.This figure includes the non-combatant andICC LITER.27th June, 1918.1
